name: boolean
description: Base StructureDefinition for boolean Type: Value of "true" or "false"

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references)

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. element.comments: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.
